definition: see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure

sentences.english: It can change material roller and collect materials automatically.
sentences.chinese: 它可以改变材料的压路机和搜集材料不攻自破。

sentences.english: Grade ability is an important technical performance in compactor operation capability.
sentences.chinese: 爬坡能力是压路机作业能力的一项主要技术性能。

sentences.english: I hope that the roller crushing, welding machine, I can not suture the sorrow.
sentences.chinese: 压路机压碎我的希望，电焊机也不能缝合我的悲伤。

sentences.english: There are no more mature domestic Walk-behind vibratory roller product.
sentences.chinese: 而手扶式振动压路机，国内尚无较成熟的产品。

sentences.english: Mainly manages Chang Linpai the car loader, the bulldozer, the road roller.
sentences.chinese: 主要经营常林牌装载机，压路机，平地机。

sentences.english: Different types of laminators have different amounts of rollers.
sentences.chinese: 不同类型的覆膜有不同数量的压路机。

sentences.english: The new system utilizes a draw roller and doctor blade .
sentences.chinese: 新系统采用了提请压路机和医生的刀片。

sentences.english: Besides the excavators there are three road rollers to load.
sentences.chinese: 除掘土机外，还有三台压路机要装。

sentences.english: The road roller crushed the soft dirt.
sentences.chinese: 那台压路机把松软的土碾平了。

sentences.english: Huge rockslides at times bury bulldozers and other machines.
sentences.chinese: 有时候巨大岩石崩落埋没了压路机及其他机器。

sentences.english: They were rolling the playground with a steam-roller.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在用压路机压平操场。

sentences.english: Such strategies have been described as "picking up nickels in front of steamrollers".
sentences.chinese: 有人形容这种类型的策略是“在压路机前面拣硬币”。

sentences.english: A steam roller is used in making and repairing roads.
sentences.chinese: 蒸汽压路机用来修筑道路。

sentences.english: One might even perhaps aptly consider that he was steamrollered politically.
sentences.chinese: 也许有人会想他可能就是政治的压路机。
